trends: There have been no other sightings in Grandhaven
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswent into the woods with a friend on seeing object touch down. a small hole in the shrub we were able to peer in.a strip of metallic metal was visable,writings of unknown origin.went to stand up was struck by a ploom of light.i woke up inside of craft with freind present on a table.i looked around as much as i could,noticing a braid like pattern of wires running throughout the floores and ceiling. i was made to stand up i sat on a dull white plastic stretcher with no wheels it floated on its own.was moved to table and examined.something extracted from body.was made to sit down again for a second.three aliens,to shorter ones.tallest one was the boss communicated to us telapathiclly.examination painful,held down during examination.asked if we could see other world,was granted permission.sat down again in chair put hands on two patterns one for each hand,when i touched them arms sucked up to elbows chin pressed to some type of chin holder,feet no stapped.peering out of a circle window left atmosphere felt gforces,came to edge of planet.when we got closer trees exactly like oures were present.seen objects living beings were present.when i was actually in visual range i observed 4to5 beings,they were so ugly i began to scream i wan to go home over and over again crying tears from my face these beings were from diffrent places it seemed they were jumping at the craft like they wanted to go home.i was extremely afraid by this time crying out of control arms still strapped in finally they let us go when i turned around an looked it was a black pyramid just like glass.a cap of silver for the tip a band of silver at the bottom.light came out of it inside of it all around it changing colers all the time.colers seemed to blend on top of itself,i was amazed.how could i have fit in such a small space it was only about 8 feet tall maybe four feet wide.a face looked at me through the transparent black like glass pyramid and one stepped out looking at me again i ran as fast as my feet would take me fearing i would get dumped off somewhere.we ran home and called the police here in muskegon county michigan,a report was filed along with all the other sightings that week. i feel like my encounter was the most significant in ufo history.i could go into more detail,but i did not want to take away from the whole story i would like to sit down with investigaters,and maybe take them to where it happen before that land is developed into housing.it was really hard to write this without crying,i am a 37 year old african american,iwas 17 years old when it happen.this significant because i beleive it is the same pyramid that has been seen in the midwest over and over again lately.
Summary: Watched a craft land. Went to where it was and was abducted 2hr.
